sentence.Network_en: Dishonest importers would be able to pocket the VAT collected from customers.
sentence.Network_cn: 不诚实的进口商将会能够把从顾客那里收取的增值税据为己有。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'dishonourable, unchaste'): from Old French deshoneste, Latin dehonestus

entry.def: If you say that a person or their behaviour is dishonest, you mean that they are not truthful or honest and that you cannot trust them.

example.ex: You have been dishonest with me...
It would be dishonest not to present the data as fairly as possible.
example.tran: 不把数据尽可能如实公开并非诚信之举。

means.word_mean: 1. deceptive or fraudulent; disposed to cheat or defraud or deceive
2. lacking honesty and oblivious to what is honorable

auth_sentence.content: I also never once found her to be dishonest.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I also never once found her to be dishonest.

auth_sentence.content: That is dishonest, and dangerous to our democracy.

auth_sentence.content: That's he's always dishonest with the media.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's he's always dishonest with the media.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

Sentence.sentence: She was dishonest in business dealings.
Who can trust someone who is dishonest or unfair?

means.word_mean: (人或其行为)不诚实的, 不老实的, 不正直的

sentences.en: A dishonest action like that will degrade you.
sentences.cn: 像这样不诚实的行为会使你降低身份。

sentences.en: It was very dishonest of you to lie to them about your qualifications.
sentences.cn: 你向他们谎报资历是很不老实的。
